item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Dear reader, Welcome to Coding Letters! My name is Victor Trejo and I am passionate about programming. In this blog, I will write about things I learn in the vast world of software development. I have two main motivations for starting this blog: I want to give back to the community. We often talk about how the internet can be a hostile place, but we easily forget how often we receive quality help for free.
